overview: Being the world's greatest spy is the easiest part of Nick Ryan's day. Being the world's greatest husband on the other hand is not something that was in the training manual. Nick has decided that on the night of their anniversary that he's going to set things right with his wife Sam. Unfortunately for him, a rival spy agency has learned his true identity and has dispatched highly trained assassins to take him down.
tagline: Being a spy is easier than being married.
title: Nick Ryan
